name: _minesweeper
description:
Number showed on the tile indicates how many other "numbered" tiles are adjacent to each other. In my take on minesweeper, you have to find those numbered tiles. In original version they would indicate the number of bombs, which are not present in this take.

Nothing too fancy, but finally something I can say I've finished. There is of course room for improvement though :).

Game have procedurally generated map, which isn't used to it's full potential (at least not yet)
